channel.title: Comments on: Bristol Mayor Marvin Rees congratulates himself in confidential Labour document for ‘saving’ libraries he tried to close and council tax reduction scheme he tried to abolish – Evidence leaked in Lebanon Saudi Arabia were in on Sri Lanka Easter massacre five days beforehand – Operation Timber Sycamore: billion dollar CIA programme to finance 2011 civil war in Syria
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness
